Title: Baby Einstein: What Does Violet See? Raindrops and Puddles.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Julie Aigner-Clark.
Categories: Juvenile Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=95IIAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A very special puddle sets Violet the mouse off on her latest nature discovery. It is through this puddle that Violet observes the effect rain has on the world around her. A Mylar puddle on the last page offers children a chance to see their reflection in a puddle, just like Violet!.
